text: DON'T MISS It's official! George Clooney, 55, and pregnant wife Amal, 39, finally confirm rumours they are expecting TWINS Due in June Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, 29, finally confirms she's PREGNANT with fiance Jason Statham, 49, as she shares burgeoning bikini bump snap 'I miss you': Sister's heartbreak over tragic Tara as it's revealed she was STILL ordering cocaine from her dealer just months before she died Mr. Grey's leading ladies! Jamie Dornan is joined on-screen lover Dakota Johnson AND wife Amelia Warner at Fifty Shades Darker premiere in London Bust night ever: Amorous Katie Price squeezes into tight top while Kieran Hayler plumps for an ill-fitting suit at Fifty Shades Darker premiere Food to get you in the mood! Sexy dishes and drinks for Valentine's Day (and why they work) SPONSORED Aphrodisiacs Lucy Mecklenburgh takes the plunge in a very low cut see-through dress for Fifty Shades Darker premiere in London Daring Madonna arrives home with her newly adopted twins from Malawi who are welcomed to New York City with their first blizzard New home Let's get spiritual! Kourtney Kardashian reunites with former fling Justin Bieber at a church service after Scott Disick's romps with models CBB reunion: Jessica Cunningham wows in a little red dress as she joins former housemates Angie Best and James Jordan, plus his wife Ola 'It's sad it evokes hatred': Tamara Ecclestone launches rant about 'sexualising breastfeeding' as she continues to nurse Sophia at almost 3 He's Prince Popular! Charles is mobbed by a host of celebrity admirers as he hosts a gala reception for his trust in London Star-studed 'I smoked a spliff in Buckingham Palace!': Robbie Williams makes shocking revelation he used recreational drugs at the Queen's Diamond Jubilee Concert PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Wild thing! Danniella Westbrook, 43, boldly flaunts her figure in a leopard print bikini on Marbella beach break... before going topless Kooking with Kim: Kardashian seductively makes a lousy salad in spoof video for fashionista pal Carine Roitfeld Domestic failure Rita Ora unveils her Hollywood makeover as she displays taut visage in understated underboob dress for Fifty Shades Darker premiere 'Blame it on the other person!' Mariah Carey cheekily dishes her best break-up advice following split from James Packer Heartbreaker Jubilant Rocco Ritchie steps out with girlfriend Kim Turnbull... as he celebrates becoming a big brother again after mum Madonna's adoption Welcome to the jun-girls! Made In Chelsea's Stephanie Pratt and Louise Thompson do glamour with a wild edge at Fifty Shades Darker premiere Tara, me and the tawdry truth about our lives as It-girls: JULIA STEPHENSON on how her endless partying disgusted her aristocratic family From one storm to another: Victoria Beckham gets caught in a blizzard as she braves the NYC weather amid husband David's email scandal Nina Dobrev puts on a thigh-skimming display in a green patterned minidress as she attends xXx: Return of Xander Cage press event in Beijing 'It's a bizarre situation': Blac Chyna and Rob Kardashian still living separately despite engagement and have not discussed wedding details Bravely baring it all! Size 22 model Tess Holliday proudly shows off her body as she goes TOPLESS in Toronto train station with group of plus-size women Braless Amanda Holden flashes more than expected in eye-wateringly tight gown while Alesha Dixon dazzles in stripes at BGT auditions Revealed: How Madonna charmed Malawian adoption judge who feared pop queen was 'robbing country's greatest asset'... its children Mini Moyles! Radio DJ Chris showcases his jaw-dropping five stone weight loss at the opening of Jamie Oliver's new restaurant in London Make-up free Jools Oliver enjoys low-key outing with sons River Rocket and Buddy Bear... shortly after revealing devastating miscarriage 'She dropped her Chanel diamond ring in a glass and said it was mine': Holly Willoughby on Tara's incredible generosity as she recalls girls' night out Golden Garrn! Supermodel Toni leads the red carpet glamour for the Django premiere at the Berlinale International Film Festival 'It might be exactly what they need!': Jeremy McConnell 'considering signing up for a CBB summer showdown with ex Stephanie Davis' That must have been one long massage! Cameron Diaz leaves parlor with marks her face from head rest after pampering session Fresh faced Reese Witherspoon shares jaw-dropping photo of herself posing with lookalike 17-year-old daughter Ava - and leaves the internet baffled about who is who 'They were extremely close': Solange Knowles stuns in cover shoot as she reveals she felt like the outsider with sister Beyoncé and Kelly Rowland Love Game! Lady Gaga is said to be dating CAA talent agent Christian Carino... after the pair were spotted cosying up for a selfie together Samantha Barks shows off her svelte figure in a chic cut-out dress as she cosies up to boyfriend Jack Fox at star-studded BAFTA 2017 gala dinner New mum Janet Jackson covers up her post-baby figure with a lavish fur cloak as she steps out in London carrying a £50,000 designer handbag Fake Love? Jennifer Lopez and Drake have 'cooled things off a bit' after sudden hot and heavy romance Going their separate ways 'Evil in the real world is worse than supernatural evil': Stranger Things 2 plot revealed... and the bad guy may not come from the Upside Down Sneak peek 'I'm going to kill myself': 911 calls reveal Mischa Barton threatened suicide during meltdown and said that she 'wanted to die' PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Hoping it will all workout? David Beckham hits the gym amid email hacking scandal Keeping a low profile Michelle Heaton showcases her super-toned figure in yet another bikini as she bounces back from THAT boozy street vomit in Australia Pistols at dawn! Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly film spoof movie Holmes and Watson on location at Hampton Court Palace Comedy gold EXCLUSIVE: Michael C. Hall and Jodi Balfour to play President John F. Kennedy and Jackie as America's First Family is introduced in second series of The Crown 'I was completely freaking out': Kelly Clarkson reveals she had a cancer scare on the day of her first Grammy Awards win Back in 2006 Bikini-clad Doutzen Kroes showcases her flawless physique as she models her sexy new swimwear range in Cuba Stunning Selena Gomez continues her chic fashion streak in long white coat and black boots in snowy New York Keeping cosy Pregnant Billie Faiers keeps her bump cosy in a shearling-lined coat and fur stole as she visits a baby scan studio Heavily pregnant EXCLUSIVE: 'It's like school sports day again': 'Gutted' Josie Gibson drowns her sorrows during après-ski... after becoming first to exit The Jump Model on the move! Suki Waterhouse displays her sculpted abs in a skimpy crop top as she works up a sweat on a gruelling hike She's all paid up! Real Housewives star Teresa Giudice has completely restored the $414,588 tax debt that was part of her sentence Cleared debt Injured Vogue Williams hobbles through the airport on crutches as she lands back in UK after ruptured knee forces her to quit The Jump Sports Illustrated's Hailey Clauson teases a glimpse of her ample bust as she models VERY raunchy swimsuit Clad in a navy swimsuit with only one strap Vintage vibes! Lindsay Lohan shows off her svelte figure in retro inspired dress as she steps out in New York City Putting in a call It incensed me... I was so cross about it': Apple Tree Yard's Mark Bonner gets a serious grilling about controversial show finale on This Morning 'I chose to pose like that': Ashley Graham defends Vogue cover after critics accused magazine of trying to make her look slimmer Speaking out Kate Beckinsale carries a puppy in her sports bra in humorous Instagram snap, joking that 'it may have belonged to a pregnant woman in the 1800s' Broadchurch's Phoebe Waller-Bridge is worlds away from prim barrister Abby as she unleashes her inner-dominatrix in racy sex scenes for BBC comedy 'I don't want my daughter to see my sex scenes': Girls star Jemima Kirke hopes her children will eventually 'understand' raunchy TV displays 'I'm barely holding it together': Scarlett Johansson reveals the challenges of motherhood amid split rumors Going solo? Viva Forever! Busy Philipps shares throwback snap of herself embracing Spice Girl glamour back in 1998 Superfan F=She loves her leather! Queen Letizia of Spain wears her favourite Hugo Boss dress AGAIN as she joins her husband for an engagement in Madrid SPOILER ALERT: Peter Barlow gets the surprise of his life as he spies Brian Packham sporting thigh high boots in hilarious Coronation Street scenes 'She just wanted to find love': Janet Street-Porter laments Tara Palmer-Tomkinson's death as Loose Women rally to mourn 'unforgettable' late star TOWIE's James Lock cannot stop smiling as he shoots scenes with busty new love interest Yazmin... before placing a tender kiss on her cheek Sofia Richie gets ANOTHER new tattoo: Teen reveals new 'loyalty' inking on her arm in latest social media post Ink mad Kanye West hits the gym for a solo workout session after enjoying a date night and ice cream with wife Kim Kardashian Back to good health 'Thank you, God for a happy day. Sorry if I've been naughty. Please help me to be good tomorrow': Childlike prayer said by 'troubled' TPT every night A hole lot of fun! Joey Essex braves the chill in tiny shorts as he joins pal Jonathan Cheban for crazy golf while filming Celebs Go Dating 'I've always been a believer honest, frank conversations': Brooke Shields announces she has landed her own radio show on SiriusXM Making (air)waves 'You make it work:' Heidi Klum discusses her experience of co-parenting with ex-husband Seal Split in 2012 after seven years of marriage Laura Carmichael looks flirty in printed skirt while former Downton Abbey co-star Michelle Dockery goes edgy for party Shia LaBeouf and girlfriend Mia Goth hold hands after romantic date at burger restaurant in Los Angeles Going strong Beaming beauty! Model Jessica Hart flaunts statuesque frame in retro chic dress as she attends New York Fashion Week Blonde bombshell Back in paradise? Cara de la Hoyde flashes her fab body in racy bikini before sharing cheeky smooch with Nathan Massey... after THAT holiday row East vs West! Chris Rock can't hide his emotions as he watches the Knicks lose to the Clippers with VIP pals Watched his team lose by a score of 119-115 One Holl of a birthday! Willoughby downs a TEQUILA shot live on This Morning as she celebrates turning 36... before being given a tiny PONY 'It feels like a racial issue': Jason Derulo slams airline after being 'disrespected' by captain and met with 15 cops after demanding to disembark Blooming beautiful! Maggie Gyllenhaal flaunts her enviable figure in clingy floral dress at Berlinale Film Festival photocall All aboard! Oprah plans to set sail in Alaska along with Gayle King in new O Magazine deal with cruise company Latest project 'Don't let anyone dull your sparkle': Helen Flanagan hits back as viewers dub her the 'worst actress ever'... but Corrie bosses EXTEND her contract 'He wasn't interested in me': Nicole Kidman reveals it took husband Keith Urban four months to call after their first meeting Slow mover CBB winner Coleen Nolan looks glum as she steps out for coffee... as her 10-year marriage to Ray Fensome hangs in the balance Things on her mind Fifty Shades FITTER: On-set personal trainer reveals how she prepped Dakota Johnson and Jamie Dornan for THOSE steamy sex scenes 'My Iranian immigrant mother teaches your kids how to read': Big Little Lies star wears powerful message against President Trump's travel ban 'When you need some Vitamin Sea': Elizabeth Hurley, 51, flaunts her figure in minuscule gold triangle bikini as she continues sun-kissed Indian getaway Gordon Ramsay reveals how he plans to quit swearing, what to cook to impress a date, and how he REFUSED to let his children eat at his restaurants Reunited and it feels so good? NeNe Leakes and Kim Zolciak return for the upcoming season 10 of Real Housewives of Atlanta Pregnant Cheryl and Liam Payne remain silent on social media as Twitter goes into meltdown with claims the singer has gone into labour Loose Women claim Elvis never saw wife Priscilla Presley in her underwear... and hope her 'new boyfriend' Sir Tom Jones 'gets a little further' Rosie Huntington-Whiteley goes topless in series of smouldering shots for new Paige Denim campaign... as pregnancy rumours continue to swirl All partied out! Kristen Stewart looks weary as she and 'girlfriend' Stella Maxwell emerge from Tommy Hilfiger bash with pal Hailey Baldwin Celebrating In BOLD position: Lewis Hamilton rocks a very colourful jacket as the F1 ace cosies up to Natasha Bedingfield at Tommy Hilfiger's Los Angeles show PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Beaming new mother Geri Horner cuddles up to husband Christian as they register the birth of their baby boy Soul legend Aretha Franklin announces she's retiring this year as she plans to spend more time with family The Queen of Soul is hanging up the mic 'I'm just a psycho myself!'
